title: Refer A Friend
body:
Hey guys just wondering if there was a refer a friend option for Oceania i found north america and south america ones but couldn't find an Oceania. 

BTW: gift me PROJECT: Yasuo

replies.body:
Not yet A Hobo With A PC.
We are working on the implementation of the new RAF for OCE but may take more time.

Hey I know this is an old thread but I was wondering if you could give us an update on how progress is going?
I know riot doesn't like giving timelines on projects but I read on the NA site that refer a friend 3 is going to be transitioned in within a few days. 
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/upcoming-refer-friend-downtime

Just hopeful if you can tell us whether the OCE implementation is running on time, or an approximate ball park for the delays?

> [{quoted}](name=MasterMirkinen,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IJIEEbYa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-04T03:32:28.342+0000)
>
> Not yet A Hobo With A PC.
> We are working on the implementation of the new RAF for OCE but may take more time.

I really, really, really, want this. Because we have a lot of stuff we can only do in customs because we need a larger population! I would love to have RAF so people would be more inclined to recruit others to the game. Next patch pls.

im glad that we are getting it because I really want to get grey ww and medieval twitch, and our poor server misses out on so much (like the ranked 3v3 icon) so I'm glad we wont miss out on skins too. :)
Thanks for letting us know
I don't think we have it.
